markdownRemark.html:
Containers

import styled from "styled-components";

const Box = styled.div`padding: 20`;

const Container = ({ children, className, style }) => {
  <Box className={className} style={style}>
    {children}
  </Box>
}

Styling

If your component renders any components that aren’t passed in as children or render props it should be possible to pass in styling to customise them. We can easily do this by accepting className and style props and setting them on the component to be rendered.

const Component = ({ children, className, style }) => {
  <div className={className} style={style}>
    {children}
  </div>
}
